Word dict to dict convertor¶

Path langsim.modules.word_dictionary.word_dict_to_dict
Executable yes

Take a word dictionary (that stores all the characters making up a word) and produce a standard dictionary datatype.

Inputs¶

No inputs

Outputs¶

No outputs
